dc_description_s: This data represents trails for Dane County, WI in 2025. [Trails are defined by the following attributes:PropertyName: Dane County Park System property or location on propertyPropertyClass: Dane County Park System Classification for park property - Recreation Park, Wildlife Area, Natural Resource Area, Historical or Cultural Site, Forest, Trail. For more information visit: https://www.danecountyparks.com/ParkSystem/Classification. TrailName: Trail name where availableSurfaceType: Predominant surface type of trail - Asphalt, Boardwalk/Bridge, Concrete (mainly next to buildings and shelters), Crushed Stone (mainly dog parks, more regional bike trails, maintenance access), Grass/Natural Earth (grass, natural surface with grass on either side, mtn bike trails are not included), Natural Earth (mainly reserved for Mtn Bike), Wood Chips, Wooden Steps.Type: Designated recreation type or maintenance access - Biking, Cross-country Skiing, Dog Park, Equestrian, Hiking, Maintenance Access, Snowshoeing. Note that in addition to designated recreational activities on trails, Park System properties are generally available to the public for nature-based outdoor activities including hiking, cross-country skiing, showshoeing in the open.RegionalTrail (yes/no): Trail is a regional trail (yes) or not (no). Regional trails are hiking and biking trails that are part of a county-wide system that connects park properties, communities, and municipal and state trail systems. They are typically paved, compacted crushed stone, and/or boardwalk. They are also open to roller blading, and roller skiing.WinterOnly (yes/no): Trail is open in winter only (yes) or available year-round (no).SkiLoop: First letter of ski loop color, trails are signed on the property (B = Blue, G = Green, O = orange, P = purple, R = Red, Y = Yellow)Miles: Trail length in miles. Trails are generally separated into segments at intersections. Regional trails may be merged into contiguous segments.]
uw_supplemental_s: This is an archived copy of the data held at UW-Madison.
